thread.title: Tom Brady Is Preparing For The Steelers By Being The Best Hockey Dad Ever
thread.title_full: Tom Brady Is Preparing For The Steelers By Being The Best Hockey Dad Ever

author: Feitelberg
title: Tom Brady Is Preparing For The Steelers By Being The Best Hockey Dad Ever
text:
Tom Brady Is Preparing For The Steelers By Being The Best Hockey Dad Ever Feitelberg | 


You hear all the time about how titans of industry are horrible fathers because they devote 100% of their time and effort into their work, but Tom Brady even beats that. He’s on his way to his 6th straight AFC Championship, he’s the greatest quarterback to ever live, he’s a legend, and the face of the NFL but he won’t settle at being the best at one thing. He’s gotta be the best at everything. On top of the best football player he’s gotta be the best dad, the best fucker (come on, look at those eyes from Gisele, she’s weak in the knees just at the sight of him), and just the best person ever. God bless him, he’s done it. 

I am curious about one thing, however, who do you think is staring at Brady more lovingly:
